title: Bug 120345Need a URL generator API from Engine
description: Bug 120345Need a URL generator API from Engine TheChart Engine can take care of evaluating the expressions inside theActionHandle before calling the Report Engine API if necessary.
EB: The Chart Engine needs the ability to generate a viewer URL from anActionHandle, this can be provided by a Report Engine public API for instance. The URL should usable as is by the viewer without any additional change.
